name: CryptoCoaster
description:
CryptoCoaster is an absolutely 100% accurate crypto trading simulator.

It's simple - just buy low, sell high, and be prepared for a bumpy ride!

How To Play:
Left mouse button, space, or enter to buy & sell.
If you're not on the track when you do, you get the 'slipped price' penalty.
When you're holding a position, it's indicated by a pink line.
Sell above that line to earn profit. The higher above it you are, the more profit you generate.
You can also sell at a loss to open a more profitable position later. I'd recommend getting as close to the line as you can when you do.
